sentences.en: Erasmus, his chief bookkeeper , waited uncertainly just beyond the entryway.
sentences.cn: 他的总管伊拉玛正在入口通道内不安地等著他.

sentences.en: I think that I should probably a good bookkeeper for you.
sentences.cn: 俺想俺可能成为贵司公的好簿记号.

sentences.en: I think that I should probably make a good bookkeeper for you.
sentences.cn: 我想我可能成为贵公司的好簿记号.

sentences.en: I was the janitor, bookkeeper, trainer, maintenance man, and boy Friday.
sentences.cn: 我既是看门人 、 会计 、 教练, 也是维修工和跑腿的.

sentences.en: I was tired of being a bookkeeper.
Marjorie Coburn used this technique to help a 35 - year - old bookkeeper.
sentences.cn: 玛乔里·库本使用这一技巧帮助了一位35 岁 的会计.

sentences.en: Miles slipped easily into the bookkeeper's work.
sentences.cn: 迈尔斯不费什么力气便适应了记帐员的工作.

sentences.en: The bookkeeper drew a check for me.
sentences.cn: 会计给我开了一张支票.

sentences.en: The bookkeeper manipulated the company's accounts to conceal his theft.
sentences.cn: 那会计篡改公司账目以掩饰他的盗款.

sentences.en: The bookkeeper used pages that were divided into columns.
sentences.cn: 记录员使用分栏的纸张.

sentences.en: The bookkeeper was entering up the sales for the past month.
sentences.cn: 会计正把上个月的销售帐目登入帐簿.

sentences.en: Virgo wears a neatly - pressed suit and tells everyone they're a bookkeeper.
sentences.cn: 处女座穿着熨帖的套装,逢人便说自己是簿记员.

sentences.en: Walter was a bookkeeper for this Harry Gordon.
sentences.cn: 沃尔特是这个哈里·戈登的薄记员.

sentences.en: Wham 0's bookkeeper could not keep up with the production figures.
sentences.cn: 生产数量激增,惠姆-奥公司的会计忙得不可开交.

sentences.en: When Hamilton was 11 years old, his mother died. Hamilton got a job as an assistant bookkeeper. He learned how to keep financial records.
sentences.cn: 他的母亲在他11岁时去世了。汉密尔顿得到了一份给会计当助手的工作。他学会了如何记账。

words.tran_cn: [会计]簿记员；会计员；铁路的司旗员

trans.tran_cn: （商人的）记账人，（政府机关等的）簿记员，会计
trans.tran_en: A bookkeeper is a person whose job is to keep an accurate record of the money that is spent and received by a business or other organization
